<!-- BEGIN_AUTOGENERATED -->

# MatchAs Node Formatting

Represents matching with renaming into specified local variable (i.e. `case 1; in Integer => a; end`)

<!-- END_AUTOGENERATED -->

## Fails because no tests are written

Before:

```ruby
case 1; in Integer => a; end
```

After:

```ruby
case 1
in Integer => a
end
```
